directions: Heat oil in a pot over medium heat. Add onion, chile pepper, and garlic. Cook until golden, 5 to 7 minutes. Add curry powder and turmeric and cook for a few seconds. Add lentils and water. Bring to a boil, about 5 minutes. Add chickpeas and continue to cook until lentils are tender, 10 to 12 minutes more. Add more water if needed.
Add spinach to curry and simmer 2 to 3 minutes. Add cilantro, lemon juice, and cayenne before serving.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed
2 cups water, or more as needed
3 cups chopped fresh spinach, or more to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste
1 dash lemon juice, or more to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or more to taste
title: Vegetarian Chickpea and Lentil Curry
